definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 8:20 summer, summer-fruit (cf. Gk. Qe/rov in both meanings);—abs. ´[[ק]]: Ge 8:22 +; [[קָָיִץ]] Am 3:15 +; sf. [[קֵיחֵח]] Is 16:9, Je 48:32;—

summer-season, opp. [[חׂרֶף]] Ge 8:22 (J), Am 3:15, Zec 14:8, Ps 74:17; ‖[[קָחִיר ]] Je 8:20, Pr 6:8, Pr 10:5, Pr 26:1, also (without [[קָחִיר]]) Pr 30:25; as fruit harvest Is 28:4; time of drought Ps 32:4 (fig.).
summer-fruit 2Sa 16:1, 2Sa 16:2, Am 8:1, Am 8:2, Je 40:10, Je 40:12 also, ‖[[בָּחִיר ]], Je 48:32, Mic 7:1 (in sim.), but ‖[[קחיר ]] Is 16:9 (assim. to [[ק]] of [[קַיִץ]]; rd. prob. [[בחיר]]).
